definitions.definition: A chant or song , especially a hymn of thanksgiving for deliverance or victory , to Apollo or sometimes another god or goddess ; hence any song sung to solicit victory in battle .
Any loud and joyous song ; a song of triumph .

main_definition: ( Ancient Greece , historical ) A chant or song , especially a hymn of thanksgiving for deliverance or victory , to Apollo or sometimes another god or goddess ; hence any song sung to solicit victory in battle .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) Any loud and joyous song ; a song of triumph .
( by extension ) An enthusiastic expression of praise .
